programme.desc: After a guilty Alex confesses his affair to Tung, his injured wife, she somehow ends up living with Alex's mother and his mistress under the same roof!

programme.title: Return of the Phoenix
programme.desc: In this masterpiece from Li Han Hsiang, sparks fly when minister Cheng Pu decides to marry off his youngest daughter before his eldest one.

programme.title: Pursuit of a Killer
programme.desc: The Five Venoms duo reunites in this tale of a Mainland Chinese criminal who escapes to Hong Kong in search of a better life, and a cop who helps him while tracking a mysterious killer.

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: This heartwarming 1963 musical from Shaw Brothers tells the tale of a beautiful shepherdess, whose own problems drag her into a love triangle.

programme.title: The Wandering Swordsman
programme.desc: This entertaining 'Robin Hood' epic features a hero who steals from the thieves and gives to the poor which sets the thieves on the warpath.

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Based on the folk legend, director Li Han Hsiang presents this humorous portrayal of the Emperor Chien Lung's adventures in Jiang Nan.

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: After a young mother and her husband die, one child is sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: A Place to Call Home
programme.desc: A young woman's life turns tragic after she discovers that she's adopted and then goes in search of her real mother.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxer
programme.desc: After enduring several trials (including his girlfriend's rape), a man (Chen Wo-Fu) puts his tai chi skills to deadly use.

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: This moving tale centers on a childless woman who cares for an emotionally battered girl.

programme.title: The Knight of Knights
programme.desc: In seeking to avenge his six comrades' murders, a swordsman must battle against Qiao Qing Monastery's notorious monks.

programme.title: The Golden Job

programme.title: The Incredible Monk
programme.desc: Tasked to protect the community from monsters, a mystic monk has to seek divine intervention when the Emperor abruptly dies, and dark forces threaten the world!

programme.title: Happiness

programme.title: The Miracles of The Namiya General Store

programme.title: Fearless

programme.title: Dealer Healer
